description: This file configures ESLint settings for a project, extending base configurations using the FlatCompat utility to support legacy or extended ESLint configurations, specifically for Next.js core web vitals and TypeScript.

methods.name: __filename
methods.description: Holds the current filename as a string, derived from import.meta.url.

methods.name: __dirname
methods.description: Contains the directory name of the current module.

methods.name: compat.extends
methods.description: Method to extend base ESLint configurations.
